General.Name: Beijing Ultrapower Software
General.Description: Beijing Ultrapower Software Co., Ltd. engages in the AI/ICT operation management, mobile game, Internet of Things communication, and innovative solutions in China and internationally. The company offers identity and access security management, zero trust network border access control, centralized O&M audit fortress, safety baseline management, and micro isolation strategy control systems; and operates security management and situation analysis platform. It serves telecommunications, finance, energy, and transportation industries. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Beijing, China.
